thread.title: Watford eyeing move for Millwall winger Fred Onyedinma after dazzling FA Cup display
thread.title_full: Watford eyeing move for Millwall winger Fred Onyedinma after dazzling FA Cup display

author: Adrian Kajumba
title: Watford eyeing move for Millwall winger Fred Onyedinma after dazzling FA Cup display
text:
Watford eyeing move for Millwall winger Fred Onyedinma after dazzling FA Cup display The Hornets are keen on the 20-year-old and plotting a move before tomorrow's deadline Share Millwall's Fred Onyedinma in action with Watford's Miguel Britos (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Watford are weighing up a late move for one of the Millwall heroes who helped knocked them out of the FA Cup. 
The Hornets are keen on Millwall winger Fred Onyedinma, 20, and plotting a move before tomorrow's deadline. 
Winger Onyedinma has been on Watford's radar for some time and impressed in the Lions' brilliant Den giant-killing against his suitors yesterday. 
QPR, whose boss Ian Holloway gave Onyedinma his Millwall debut, and Hull are also keen on the exciting prospect. Read More Millwall boss Neil Harris says Lions can knock anyone out at The Den Millwall striker Steve Morison celebrates his winner (Photo: AFP) 
Onyedinma has been one of Millwall's best attacking players this season and has already made almost 100 Football League appearances. 
He is yet to agree a new deal with his current contract up this summer so Millwall would only bank a cut-price free if a deal is done before tomorrow's deadline. Read More
